queries.name: codes_by_type
queries.description: Codes by channel, league, or user_id

queries.name: league_players
queries.description: List league players who have metadata

queries.name: mentions
queries.description: List mentions of you, reverse chronological order

queries.name: recent_squad_banks
queries.description: Returns a list of info about recent squad banks for a super squad

queries.name: my_channels
queries.description: Get channels for currently logged in user

queries.name: pushed_topics
queries.description: Get recently pushed topics for channel

queries.name: user_drafts_by_league_mock
queries.description: list user drafts by status, like in_progress drafts

queries.name: get_promos_shared_to_you
queries.description: Get a list of promos shared with this user

queries.name: matchup_legs_raw
queries.description: Matchup Legs for round - without context or players etc - fast query - don't overwrite reducer version

queries.name: user_rosters
queries.description: Get a list of user rosters

queries.name: user_by_email_phone_or_username
queries.description: Get user by email, phone, or username

queries.name: current_squad_weekly_meter
queries.description: Get the current weekly meter for a super squad

queries.name: roles_by_type
queries.description: Get all roles for a given channel or league

queries.name: get_dm_by_members
queries.description: Grab DM if it exists based on member_ids provided, null if not

queries.name: draft_offers
queries.description: fetch draft offers for a pick

queries.name: league_users_metadata
queries.description: Get all permanent metadata for users within a single league

queries.name: messages_by_reaction
queries.description: Get messages sorted by number reactions

queries.name: roster_standings
queries.description: Get roster standings for league and round

queries.name: rosters_by_user
queries.description: List rosters owned by a user

queries.name: league_transactions
queries.description: List all transactions in a leg

queries.name: user_drafts_by_draft
queries.description: list user drafts by status, like in_progress drafts

queries.name: app_info
queries.description: Get app info, like version, etc

queries.name: active_channel_topics
queries.description: Get active channel topics with limit

queries.name: activities
queries.description: List activities (like create_message and create_topic for inbox)

queries.name: trending_channel_topics
queries.description: Get trending channel topics with limit

queries.name: previous_squad_weekly_meter
queries.description: Get the previous weekly meter for a super squad

queries.name: search_leagues
queries.description: Search user related items like leagues, leaguemates, dms, and people in dms

queries.name: my_winnings
queries.description: Get a summary of a user's winnings.

queries.name: weekly_stats
queries.description: Get complete weekly stats for every player

queries.name: dm_members
queries.description: Get all users within a DM

queries.name: user_drafts
queries.description: list user drafts for a sport, season_type, season

queries.name: inbound_requests
queries.description: Inbound requests (someone inviting me to connect as a friend or inviting me to DM)

queries.name: weekly_meter_by_id
queries.description: Get a weekly meter for a super squad by ID

queries.name: stats_for_players_in_week
queries.description: Stats for multiple players in a week

queries.name: roster_draft_picks_by_draft
queries.description: Fetch picks that were traded for a completed league draft or mock draft

queries.name: read_receipts
queries.description: List read receipts for any DM, League, or Draft (doesn't work for channels/topics as they are partitioned differently)

queries.name: my_preferences
queries.description: All preferences for logged in user

queries.name: squad_bank_by_id
queries.description: Get a squad bank for a super squad by ID

queries.description: Outbound requests (Friend request invites I sent)

queries.description: Is user subscribed to this ID?

queries.description: Returns a list of info about recent weekly meters for a super squad

queries.description: Get promo claims by type for user

queries.name: matchup_legs_related_to_roster

queries.description: Search user related items like leagues, leaguemates, dms, and people in dms

queries.name: user_drafts_by_status
queries.description: list user drafts by status, like in_progress drafts

queries.name: game_stats
queries.description: Get complete game stats for every player

queries.name: previous_squad_bank
queries.description: Get the previous squad bank for a super squad

queries.name: reactions
queries.description: Get reactions of a specific type for a specific message

queries.name: current_squad_bank
queries.description: Get the current squad bank for a super squad

queries.name: get_player_stats
queries.description: Player stats for season or game (if game_id, week, or date are not provided, we use season stats)

queries.description: Get a list of DMs for a particular user, with ability to do before query

queries.name: generate_parlay_transactions_report
queries.description: Generate a transaction report for a user

queries.description: Search banned users within a channel

queries.name: league_transactions_by_player
queries.description: League transactions by player and league

queries.name: is_friend
queries.description: A query to check if a this user is a friend or not

queries.description: All roles for a user given a channel / league / group

queries.name: roster_draft_picks_by_owner
queries.description: Fetch picks that were traded owned by a specific player

queries.description: Requests for a type (like who's been invited to a group DM?)

queries.name: get_in_progress_user_pools
queries.description: List of user's user pools that have not been graded.

queries.name: season_stats
queries.description: Get complete season stats for every player

queries.name: get_favorite_teams
queries.description: Get favorite teams for a user. If no user_id is provided, we use the current user

queries.name: owned_leagues
queries.description: List leagues for which the specified user is a owner(commish)

mutations.name: draft_pass_offering
mutations.description: Signals this user does not wish to make any more offers to a player

mutations.name: update_user_flairs
mutations.description: Update the flairs for a user returns the updated user

mutations.name: create_tutorial_message
mutations.description: Create a tutorial message, in a DM / League / Draft / etc...

mutations.name: create_roster
mutations.description: Create a roster in league (for bracket mania)

mutations.name: assign_roster_draft_pick
mutations.description: Draft Pick Trading - Assign Pick - commissioner only

mutations.name: add_league_player_note
mutations.description: Add league player note, can use this to overwrite as well

mutations.name: delete_reaction
mutations.description: Remove a reaction from a message

mutations.name: track_channel_join
mutations.description: Track Channel Join, temporary workaround for not enough trending channels

mutations.name: unassign_roster_draft_pick
mutations.description: Draft Pick Trading - Unassign Pick - commissioner only

mutations.name: draft_set_keeper
mutations.description: Set a keeper on a draft board

mutations.name: draft_hover_player
mutations.description: select player but don't immediately nominate

mutations.name: unlock_chopped_roster
mutations.description: Unlock a chopped roster, for chopped leagues only, this does not add players back to the roster

mutations.name: draft_make_offer
mutations.description: make a draft offer to a player

mutations.name: upsert_league_manual_history
mutations.description: Create or update manual league history

args.description: if valid, will replace this existing pick with the new one
args.name: pick_to_replace

mutations.name: add_role
mutations.description: Add a role to a channel, group, or league

mutations.name: create_pending_user
mutations.description: Create a user with display name and avatar_url

mutations.name: delete_async_bundles
mutations.description: Delete bundles to User's async bundles

mutations.name: clone_to_chopped
mutations.description: Clone a league to chopped league

mutations.name: delete_roster
mutations.description: Delete a roster in league (for bracket mania)

mutations.name: draft_end_phase
mutations.description: Ends the current draft phase (sets timer to 0)

mutations.name: migrate_league_note
mutations.description: Commissioner migrates league note from previous league

mutations.name: user
mutations.description: Create a user with display name and avatar_url

mutations.name: unban_channel_user
mutations.description: Unban a user from a channel

args.description: Map of bonuses to enter, key is bonus type, value is number of entries for specific bonus.
args.name: bonuses

mutations.name: remove_role
mutations.description: Remove a role from a channel / league

mutations.name: remove_league_player_trade_block
mutations.description: Remove league player from trade block

mutations.name: add_async_bundles
mutations.description: Add bundles to User's async bundles

mutations.name: ban_channel_user
mutations.description: Ban a user from a channel

mutations.name: update_channel_tags
mutations.description: Update a list of channel tags

mutations.name: create_topic_subscriptions
mutations.description: Create subscriptions on behalf of others

mutations.name: force_cancel_transaction
mutations.description: Force cancel any transaction - commissioners only

mutations.name: draft_resume_offering
mutations.description: Signals this user would like to make offers to a player

mutations.name: update_league_user_metadata
mutations.description: Update a League User Settings, for push notifications, etc

mutations.name: migrate_pinned_messages
mutations.description: Commissioner migrates pinned messages from previous league

args.description: Whether the dues feature is enabled defaults to true
args.name: enabled

args.description: Whether to send reminders to users defaults to false
args.name: reminders_enabled

mutations.name: update_tiebreaker
mutations.description: Set tiebreaker field for a tournament bracket

mutations.name: chop_roster
mutations.description: Chop a roster, for chopped leagues only

mutations.name: set_user_exclusion
mutations.description: Sets the user's self exclusion period. nil means indefinitely

mutations.name: accept_legal_agreement
mutations.description: accept legal agreement of a given type

mutations.name: update_preferences
mutations.description: Update preference value for user_id, type_id, and name

mutations.name: dm_unpaid_league_dues
mutations.description: Send DMs to unpaid league members

mutations.name: league_update_display_order
mutations.description: Update my leagues display order (for left panel)

mutations.name: draft_set_nominator
mutations.description: override the current nominator in an auction draft

mutations.name: draft_pick_player
mutations.description: User Pick a player for draft

mutations.name: draft_clear_afk_rounds
mutations.description: Signals this user is not afk

mutations.name: create_message
mutations.description: Create a message.  Options include channel_id, shard_min, & shard_max for cases if it's a topical message

mutations.name: send_request
mutations.description: Request a user to be a friend, join group, channel, or league. Types are league, dm_group, dm_single, friend, and channel

directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if` argument is true.
directives.name: skip

directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true."
directives.name: include

types.description:
The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional
values as specified by
[IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).
types.name: Float

types.description:
The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8
character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to
represent free-form human-readable text.
types.name: String

types.description:
The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values.
Int can represent values between `-(2^53 - 1)` and `2^53 - 1` since it is
represented in JSON as double-precision floating point numbers specified
by [IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).
types.name: Int
